import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {isLength, isMatch} from '../../utils/validation/Validation' import {showSuccessMsg, showErrMsg} from '../../utils/notification/Notification' const initialState = { title:'', price: 0, description: '', location:'', category:'', phone:'', err: '', success:'' } function CreateProduct() { const [product, setProduct] = useState(initialState) const { title, price, description, location, category, phone, err, success } = product const handleChangeInput = e => { const { name, value } = e.target setProduct({...product,[name]:value, err:'', success:''}) } return (
